data.title: Across the Sea of Suns

New York: Timescape Books, 1984. First Edition. Hardcover. Item #13819

ISBN: 0671446681

Remainder mark on bottom edge. A fine copy in very good dustjacket with a tear to lower edge of rear panel. Signed and inscribed by Benford on the half-title page. ; Octavo; Signed by Author.
